title: Staying Level
description:
Swagu and Perk are back and they react to LeBron's contract extension, the latest chapter in the KD saga including the reports that Durant has given the Nets an ultimatum, if the Knicks should trade for Donovan Mitchell, and Lamar Jackson's current contract situation. Also the guys have a message regarding the murder of youth football coach Mike Hickman. Tune In!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
